overview: Cédric Giorgi is the founder and CEO of Cookening. This startup is a new collaborative consumption platform in the food industry. Before that, he was Director Europe for Seesmic during one year and Marketing Director for Scoop.it (previously known as Goojet) during four years. Cédric started being involved in the startup industry in 2005 when he started blogging on his own blog, which led him to the position of Techcrunch France Co-Editor and Conference Organizer during one year and half until mid 2011. Cédric is regularly organizer, curator, moderator or speaker at various conferences, the most famous one being LeWeb where Cédric is part of the organisation and Social Track Curator/Moderator. Cédric is also a mentor at various startup programs (Le Camping) and always happy to help the French and European Startup Ecosystem. Cédric has graduated from INSA Toulouse Engineering School and ESC Toulouse Business School and is fluent in French, English and German.

milestones.description: Cédric joined Seesmic as Europe Director
